DOC.brief_summary: The overall objective project assess effectiveness cost-effectiveness RUF ( ready-to-Use Food , Plumpy Doz ( r ) ) prevent moderate acute malnutrition child age 6-36 month embed program conditional household food assistance .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Ready-to-Use-Food ( RUF ) Supplement Prevent Acute Child Malnutrition
DOC.criteria: WH≥80 % median NCHS reference without bilateral pitting oedema ; Age ≥ 6 month ≤36 month ; Member household dependency ratio > 4 ; Not plan leave study zone come 5 month ; Not show appetite ; Age < 6 month age > 36 month WeightforHeight Zscore < 2 and/or presence bilateral pitting oedema child 636 month ; Member household dependency ration ≤ 4 ; Clinical complication Presence chronic illness , cardiac disease , congenital abnormality , cancer ; Being allergic one ingredient RUF .
